summary: Project to create a UI with a button that performs no action when clicked.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page UI that displays one clearly-labeled button; clicking/tapping the button must intentionally perform no action (no navigation, no state change, no network calls, no console logging, no alerts/toasts).

Apply a coherent visual theme across the page (colors, typography, spacing, and button styling) with a distinct style direction that fits a playful 'minimal UI' concept; keep styling consistent across all components used.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a button UI element that does nothing when pressed/clicked.
